snippet: As no new traces of Christopher J. Dorner, wanted in three shooting deaths, were found, the authorities wondered if he had somehow slipped through their fingers.
abstract: Search for Christopher J Dorner, former Los Angeles police officer wanted in three killings, continues in Big Bear Lake area, even as blizzard covers mountains with foot of snow; authorities, noting that no new traces of suspect have been found, wonder if he has somehow escaped region.
lead_paragraph: As no new traces of Christopher J. Dorner, wanted in three shooting deaths, were found, the authorities wondered if he had somehow slipped through their fingers.

headline.main: Cold Trail and Blizzard Hamper Search for Ex-Officer in California Killings
headline.print_headline: Cold Trail and Blizzard Hamper Search for Ex-Officer in California Killings
